column6: In the tradition of MARVELS and from the creative team behind ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN!,2004,2The Daily Bugle has never been a friend of the super heroes of NYC, but with profits down and the newspaper's survival on the line, J. JONAH JAMESON turns the heat up a notch! Meet the Bugle's new team of super hero investigative journalists - Jessica Jones, Kat Farrell & Ben Urich - as they dig up the dirt on the city's most famous heroes ... NO MATTER THE COST or WHO GETS HURT!32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller (cover):Mike Mayhew
